title: Built-in Microwave, Large Picture Windows, Den/Study
neighborhood: 550 N. Figueroa st., Los Angeles, CA

posting_body: ['Imagine a home where the fine art of living has been perfected.', 'Welcome to The Orsini, home to the best apartments in downtown Los Angeles.', 'From the moment you enter the elegant Mediterranean inspired 2-story foyer at The Orsini, you will realize that you have come home to a new experience in luxury apartment living.', 'We are in the heart of Los Angeles, California and the pulse of extraordinary living.', 'Enjoy a short commute to the LA Fashion District, Staples Center, Disney Concert Hall, Chinatown and all the amazing dining and glamorous shopping that living in Los Angeles has to offer.', 'AMENITIES AND FEATURES', '-Two Print & Copy Rooms', '-Outdoor Fireplace', '-Dedicated Gated Parking For Residents', '-Peaceful, Lushly Landscaped Courtyards', '-Six Private Computer Rooms with High-Speed Internet Access', '-Spectacular Two-Story Entry Lobby', '-Elegant Ceramic Tile Floors', '-Junior Olympic-Size Swimming Pool and Spa (Heated for Year-Round Use)', '-Designer Selected Color Schemes', '-Star Trac/Cybex Strength Training Weight Machines', '-Two Mail Rooms with Package Acceptance Services', '-Natural Stone Marble Counter Bath', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'WEBSITE', '<URL>', 'ADDRESS', '550 N.
